verses.text: \w After|strong="H6430"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w had|strong="H6430"\w* \w captured|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3947"\w* God, \w they|strong="H3947"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* Ebenezer \w to|strong="H3947"\w* Ashdod,

\w That|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w why|strong="H5921"\w*, \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Dagon|strong="H1712"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* enter \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Dagon|strong="H1712"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Ashdod \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* step \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w threshold|strong="H4670"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* people \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Ashdod \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H5221"\w* vicinity, ravaging \w them|strong="H5221"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* afflicting \w them|strong="H5221"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w tumors|strong="H6076"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w men|strong="H3478"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Ashdod \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w what|strong="H7200"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* happening, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H3651"\w*, “\w The|strong="H5921"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w must|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w stay|strong="H3427"\w* \w here|strong="H3651"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w His|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* heavy \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H7200"\w* \w god|strong="H3808"\w* \w Dagon|strong="H1712"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H4100"\w* called together \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rulers \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?” “\w It|strong="H6213"\w* \w must|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* moved \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*,” \w they|strong="H4100"\w* replied. \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H4100"\w* \w carried|strong="H6213"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* moved \w the|strong="H5221"\w* ark \w to|strong="H5704"\w* Gath, \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w throwing|strong="H3027"\w* \w it|strong="H5221"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w confusion|strong="H4103"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* afflicting \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w men|strong="H1419"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, both \w young|strong="H6996"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w old|strong="H1419"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* outbreak \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w tumors|strong="H6076"\w*.

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* ark \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w*, \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* arrived, \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w Ekronites|strong="H6139"\w* \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w*, “\w They|strong="H5971"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w brought|strong="H5437"\w* \w us|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* ark \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* order \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w us|strong="H1961"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w our|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*!”

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Ekronites \w called|strong="H8033"\w* \w together|strong="H5971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rulers \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* said, “\w Send|strong="H7971"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ark \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w It|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w so|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*!” \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w deadly|strong="H4194"\w* \w confusion|strong="H4103"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* pervaded \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w* \w upon|strong="H3027"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*.

Those \w who|strong="H5221"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w were|strong="H8064"\w* afflicted \w with|strong="H5892"\w* \w tumors|strong="H6076"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* outcry \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.
